title: MedicalConditionStage
description: A stage of a medical condition, such as 'Stage IIIa'.

allOf.description: A utility class that serves as the umbrella for a number of 'intangible' things in the medical space.

stageAsNumber.description: The stage represented as a number, e.g. 3.

subStageSuffix.description: The substage, e.g. 'a' for Stage IIIa.
